snippet: In his final home game, Buddy Hield scored 23 points for the sixth-ranked Sooners.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Oklahoma beats Baylor, 73-71; other college basketball news noted.

headline.main: Oklahoma Beats Baylor; Virginia Rallies on Road
